headline: Investors Heavily Search Fortinet, Inc. (FTNT): Here is What You Need to Know
summary: Zacks.com users have recently been watching Fortinet (FTNT) quite a bit. Thus, it is worth knowing the facts that could determine the stock's prospects.

headline: Fortinet FortiCNAPP Upgrade Highlights Cloud Security Integration And Investor Focus
summary: Fortinet has introduced major upgrades to its FortiCNAPP platform, unifying network, data, and runtime security for cloud environments. The update adds network aware risk scoring, native Data Security Posture Management, and unified workflows aimed at improving cloud risk management. These changes seek to reduce reliance on fragmented tools and give security teams clearer, more actionable cloud risk insights. For investors watching Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT), this product update comes with...
